name: cbvex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wn(wex(s0, w0)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wn(wex(s0, w0)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr3i(wn(wex(s0, w0)), wn(wex(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. See ~ cbvexv , ~ cbvexv1 , and ~ cbvexvw for weaker versions using fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)
